prawina sahithyawediyeku wana somawira senanayakayan pasugiyada apa atharin samugaththeya. 1972 wasaredi ‘mawakage githaya’ wenuwenda, 1983 wasaredi ‘manik nadiya gala basi’ nawakathawa wenuwenda, 1977 wasaredi ‘yashorawaya’ nawakathawa wenuwenda rajya sahithya sammana lada sahithyawediyeku wana hethema, harawathmala telinatya kshethrayakatada thiranataka rachakayeku lesa prabala balapamak ella kala nirmanawediyeki.

wayambaa palathe puththalama disthrikkaye naththandiya aasanaye mahawawa pradeshiya lekam wasame sundara gamak wana walahapitiya gammanaye ihala walahapitiye mahawawa sanskruthika madhyasthanaya ihatha ki dakma, mehewara, aramuna sakshath kara ganimata apa kapa wi athi bawa itha sathutin nihathamaniwa danwa sitimi. 2001/11/27 wana dina ewakata siti chandrika bandaranayaka janadhipathi thumiyage sankalpayak anuwa ewakata agamathi rathnasiri wikramanayaka mathithumage maga penwima yatathe mema madhyasthanaya idikara ewakata dhiwara amathi milroyi pranandu amathyathumage aaradhanayen prawina kala karu tharsi warnakulasuriya mathithuma athin wiwrutha wu wagayi.

kolambaa-katunayaka adhiwegi margaye langama bas dhawanaya eeye (28 ) ude suba mohothin aarambha kerini.langama basratha 16 k eeye dhawanayata ek kerunu athara, kolambaa - katunayaka basratha 07 kda, kolambaa - migamuwa basratha 09 kda, weyi.prawahana amathi kumara welgama mahatha pitakotuwa madhyama basnawathum palenda, dhiwara niyojya amathi sarath kumara gunarathna mahatha migamuwa bas nawathum palenda, parlimenthu manthrini sudarshani pranandu pulle mahathmiya katunayaka guwan thotupala paminime paryanthaya asalinda me bas sewa aarambha kalaha.kolambaa- katunayaka gaman gasthuwa rupiyal 130k wana athara, kolambaa- migamuwa rupiyal150 kda ,kolambaa- jaala rupiyal100 kda weyi.sama paya bhagayakatama warak bas rathayak dhawanaya kerena bawa langama pawasayi.
